synopsis.text: Superior technology has advanced by 2012, but everyday life for young men like Kei remains filled with homework and romantic complications. However, when Earth is suddenly under attack by enigmatic robotic forces, Kei finds himself selected to defend humanity. Alongside his childhood friend Naoki, Kei joins Spirits, a government-regulated group tasked with piloting the Devadasy, a powerful mech discovered two decades earlier by Kei's grandfather. As Kei and Naoki train to master the Devadasy and protect Earth, they begin to uncover secrets about the mech, their fellow pilot Amala, and even Kei himself. In order to activate the Devadasy's full potential, Kei must find his perfect match, as only a harmonious pair can unlock its true power and safeguard mankind's future.
